mapper.select: SELECT aa.a_acc_no, aa.a_acc_name, aa.a_acc_kind, ar.a_r_state, ar.a_r_check_in, ar.a_r_price FROM tbl_admin_accommodation aa JOIN tbl_admin_room ar ON aa.a_acc_no = ar.a_acc_no
select a_i_no from tbl_accommodation_image where a_acc_no = #{a_acc_no}
select a_i_no, a_acc_no, a_i_image from tbl_accommodation_image where a_acc_no = #{a_acc_no}

SELECT aa.a_acc_no, aa.a_m_no, aa.a_acc_name, am.a_m_name, aa.a_acc_intro, aa.a_acc_kind, aa.a_acc_bn, aa.a_acc_address, aa.a_acc_phone, am.a_m_email, aa.a_acc_reg_date FROM tbl_admin_accommodation aa JOIN tbl_admin_member am ON aa.a_m_no = am.a_m_no WHERE aa.a_acc_no = #{a_acc_no} AND aa.use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: UPDATE tbl_admin_accommodation SET a_acc_longitude = #{a_acc_longitude}, a_acc_latitude = #{a_acc_latitude} WHERE a_acc_no = #{a_acc_no}
